title: Bars, restaurants are back to lure, but drinks are in the house
description: The The pandemic-induced trend of Indians drinking more at home has not yet been fully reversed even as bars and restaurants have opened up completely and are doing brisk business. According to the latest data from global alcohol market analysts IWSR, 82.5% of alcobev sales in India last calendar year were from 'off-premise', or retail stores.
